Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Self-respect \Self`-re*spect"\, n. Respect for one's self; regard for one's character; laudable self-esteem. [1913 Webster]
self-respect n : the quality of being worthy of esteem or respect; "it was beneath his dignity to cheat"; "showed his true dignity when under pressure" [syn: {dignity}, {self-esteem}, {self-regard}]
